lines.text: Oh, lady, if you could count on women the way they can count on that star, there'd be much more smooth sailing and far less wrecks.
Well! Personal experience or something out of a book?
I see... out of a book.

[Angry with Tony]
I'll show him! H's a bad tooth. and somebody ought to pull him out!

[to Tony]
Yeah, some people get ideas standin' up, and some get them sittin' down, but I figure if we just get you a feather bed, we'd never have to work again.
Fine thing! Shanghaied in Honolulu! Well, why don't you do something about it?
Well, shucks, them boys won't give us trouble if we let 'em have their own way. They ain't cannibals. Besides, if they was, you'd be safe.

[She starts to respond but realizes her looks have been impugned and pauses after a double take]
Why, sure, I'd...
